title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: Pink Sale Finance offers a distinctive experience in terms of launchpad. Its idea is to connect projects to the public, which allows developers to launch airdrop, private sale, or IDO easily.In fact, anyone can easily lauch a campaign on Pink Sale Finance. The platform provides every necessary element from creating a non-coding token, running KYC, audit, launching presale campaigns, and even outsourcing marketing operation, etc.On the other hand, this launchpad grants investors an early access to high-potential projects without a need to hold its native token.Learn more about Pink Sale Finance in our article.

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: I would not call this as a platform that was launching the potential projects. Many of projects launched on pinksale were just scam projects. This projects may have done doxxed for some of projects launched on its launch pad but scammers are even smarter than it. That's only a place to find a new token to be used to pump and dump. I have seen bunch of tokens launched from this launch pad is die

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Ive tried investing on this one time and I could say that this platform is a launchpad for shitcoin. It does grant investors some hefty rewards but some also got burned. Liquidity is injected and afterwards, its a pump and dump time youll eventually needed to monitor and when to exit. Its rarely to see that a dumped price could recover many times maybe few times but in the end no tokens can survive for a long stint. So if you like to play here, better have some discipline when you earned cause if you are long term maxi then its definitely not your cup of tea.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: The most favourite launched by shit coin developers. Anything that launched through this launch pad was shit coin. I remember the days when pinksale has become the most popular platforms among shit coin speculators. They were always raising money through this platform and then scammer will go away with all of money. The launch pad itself has no a proper development. This launch pad has been contributing a lot to the so many scam token that exist in the market.

comments.author: goinmerry
comments.body: OP, can you please name a project that is able to have a successful launchpad on that platform? Should have a decent volume in Pancakeswap or Uniswap.But I'm not expecting an answer from the OP since referring to his post history, the majority of his post is introducing something e.g platform, then will leave that thread for good. No additional content nor responding to any queries.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Project like this makes a shitcoin get an easy money for funding. Typically this kind of poor launchpad acquire an IDO of shit tokens that usually result to a pump and dump scheme. The project is abandoned right after the token sale and few listing occur because the team is dumping there tokens on the exchange which the liquidity coming from investors lock in. Much better to stick on trusted launch to make sure that you are not investing on ponzi shit tokens. You should invest on partnership to solid projecT for this kind of business.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: goinmerry on October 15, 2022, 10:32:10 AMOP, can you please name a project that is able to have a successful launchpad on that platform? Mate All of shitcoin there probably launched well but the sad part is if those projects last for long. Im sure OP can name a lot of shitcoins but not a project that stays longer within specific period of time.Quote from: goinmerry on October 15, 2022, 10:32:10 AMthe majority of his post is introducing something e.g platform, then will leave that thread for good. No additional content nor responding to any queries.Most likely he is just introducing a platform and create a new one. I do hope OP doesnt only farm possible merits but also care to monitor his topic in case it was spammed. Or no one can respond to such inquiry.

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: I've heard a lot about pinksale and the truth is they introduce any projects that's ready to pay them some money, either legit or scam its none of their problem so no this is not a good launching platform for new projects, its more like a meme and jokes launching platform, nothing serious.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Only stupid investors want to buy tokens that are presale on Pink Sale, so far I haven't heard of any successful projects on this platform. Why? I'm sure it's because of the convenience they offer developers.They don't have a high standard for sales on their platform, so there are tons of developers who don't take them seriously just to try their luck in project development. Not even a little I heard that the average project that sells at the Pink Sale ends in a scam.

Many of projects launched on pinksale were just scam projects. This projects may have done doxxed for some of projects launched on its launch pad but scammers are even smarter than it. That's only a place to find a new token to be used to pump and dump. I have seen bunch of tokens launched from this launch pad is dieYes, you are right, man, there are many products from the pink sale that end quickly or die, even though the developers have done KYC to convince investors, in fact KYC is no longer meaningful now, what is important for them is just to collect as much money as they can.

Up until today, I have not seen any projects launched on it that could be considered potential or successful. Check OP's profile it looks like your account is getting money to post shills for junk projects and the pink sale is your latest project just received. I recommend you research projects carefully before marketing them, to enhance your reputation on the forum.

comments.author: fvb
comments.body: I never used this site at all, because I didn’t like it right away, that is, it didn’t inspire confidence in me. When I found out that you can buy a token of a new project there, I immediately forgot about the project. Because, as it was already said here, there were many tokens that never left this site. This is a simple fundraiser.

comments.author: Lorokan
comments.body: Quote from: HB Wallet on October 14, 2022, 06:23:35 AMPink Sale Finance offers a distinctive experience in terms of launchpad. Its idea is to connect projects to the public, which allows developers to launch airdrop, private sale, or IDO easily.In fact, anyone can easily lauch a campaign on Pink Sale Finance. The platform provides every necessary element from creating a non-coding token, running KYC, audit, launching presale campaigns, and even outsourcing marketing operation, etc.On the other hand, this launchpad grants investors an early access to high-potential projects without a need to hold its native token.Learn more about Pink Sale Finance in our article. I rarely do this, so today i want to give more details about the PinkSale Finance Launchpad. PinkSale is a decentralized finance platform where you can create your own tokens, and launch them successful in 5 minutes.On PinkSale, you can create token contracts such as: Standard Token Auto Add LP TokenBaby TokenBuyback Baby TokenAfter creating your own tokens, you can launch your tokens using any of the presale launch options as stated below: Presale LaunchpadFairlaunch PresaleSubscription Presale Dutch Auction PresalePrivate SaleIt is important to remember that Pinksale is a decentralized launchpad where everyone can launch their presale or list their own tokens. Always do your own research before investing. You can learn more definitely on your own.Also, in Pinksale, there are lots of metrics available that guides investment decision, you should take advantage of this 100%. Pinksale remains the NO 1 DEFI Launchpad where you can launch your own token for total success. For further assistance

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: HB Wallet on October 14, 2022, 06:23:35 AMPink Sale Finance offers a distinctive experience in terms of launchpad. Its idea is to connect projects to the public, which allows developers to launch airdrop, private sale, or IDO easily.In fact, anyone can easily lauch a campaign on Pink Sale Finance. The platform provides every necessary element from creating a non-coding token, running KYC, audit, launching presale campaigns, and even outsourcing marketing operation, etc.I have never heard of Pink Sale Finance before, so i can not really say to much if this project is a legit or a scam project, but i have some experience with other launchpads and crowd VC's. I am part of DuckDao and Poolz and i have to say that during the bull market it was pretty crazy. There were a lot of investment opportunities where you could invest into the priate sale of upcoming projects and in most cases those tokens did at least a x10 right at the listing. So you could have made quite some profit there. Now obviously it is much quieter in the bear market as not so many projects are launching but still i could invest into the magicsquare private sale through DuckDao, which is a great opportunity in my opinion.
